attributes.action: DO NOT SIGN ANY PANDEMIC TREATY with WHO it is UNLAWFUL.
attributes.additional_details:
" And I doe declare That no Foreign Prince Person Prelate, State or Potentate hath or ought to have any Jurisdiction Power Superiority Preeminence or Authority Ecclesiastical or Spiritual within this Realm So help me God."  

The "BILL OF RIGHTS" is still in FULL effect. NO changes are outstanding;- 

https://www.legislation.gov.uk/aep/WillandMarSess2/1/2/introduction

What part of this does the Government NOT understand.

SPEAKER OF THE HOUSE "MUST" ADDRESS PARLIAMENT ON THIS ISSUE.
attributes.background: The Government need to learn that they CANNOT give ANY of our SOVEREIGNTY to ANYONE. It is unlawful under the English "BILL OF RIGHTS". Under the Supremacy clause.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Do not sign any WHO Pandemic Treaty unless it is approved via public referendum
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614335
